div.p: ROELLA in botany : A genus of the monogynia order, belonging to the pentandria claſs of plants ; and in the natural method ranking under the 29th order, Campanace<ε. The corolla is funnel-ſhaped, with its bottom ſhut up by ſtaminiferous valvules ; the ſtigma is bifid ; the capſule bilocular, and cylindrical inferior.
